item.title: Bootstrapped, episode 87, with Charles Perry
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
WRT _David Smith’s business, keep in mind early on he created the app Audiobooks https://david-smith.org/apps/ https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/audiobooks/id311507490?mt=8 so he does “own” a prime App Store search term. One could argue his business model in general is more about finding a first mover advantage than throwing a bunch of stuff against the wall. On podcasts he has said he’ll read through the upcoming API changes and try to figure out what kind of app he can build that wasn’t possible before and be one of the first to market with it, like he was with his Pedometer++ app using the motion coprocessor. The use of new features also helps get his apps featured by Apple.
